thread.title: 'Tawag' judges Karylle, K Brosas, Kyla perform OPM hits
thread.title_full: 'Tawag' judges Karylle, K Brosas, Kyla perform OPM hits

author: ABS-CBN News
title: 'Tawag' judges Karylle, K Brosas, Kyla perform OPM hits
text:
'Tawag' judges Karylle, K Brosas, Kyla perform OPM hits ABS-CBN News Posted at Feb 28 2017 04:14 PM | Updated as of Feb 28 2017 04:27 PM 
Share Watch also in iWantv or TFC.tv 
Singers Karylle, Kyla and K Brosas performed a medley of the OPM hits "Urong Sulong,""Mr. Kupido" and "Kapag Tumibok Ang Puso" on "It's Showtime" on Tuesday. 
Karylle, Kyla and K Brosas are judges of "Tawag ng Tanghalan," which is now on the second day of its wild card week. 
The grand finals of the hit singing competition will be held next week. 
It's Showtime, February 28, 2017 
Share
